title: Big Little Lies (TV series)
summary: Big Little Lies is an American drama television series based on the 2014 novel of the same name by Liane Moriarty. Created and written by David E. Kelley, it premiered on HBO on February 19, 2017, and concluded on July 21, 2019,[2][3] encompassing 14 episodes and two seasons.
